name: content
description: Description: The content of the status at this revision.

name: spoiler_text
description: Description: The content of the subject or content warning at this revision.

name: sensitive
description: Description: Whether the status was marked sensitive at this revision.

name: created_at
description: Description: The timestamp of when the revision was published.

name: account
description: Description: The account that published this revision.

name: poll OPTIONAL
description: Description: The current state of the poll options at this revision. Note that edits changing the poll options will be collapsed together into one edit, since this action resets the poll.

name: poll.options[]
description: Description: The poll options at this revision.

name: poll.options[].title
description: Description: The text for a poll option.

name: media_attachments
description: Description: The current state of the poll options at this revision. Note that edits changing the poll options will be collapsed together into one edit, since this action resets the poll.

name: emojis
description: Description: Any custom emoji that are used in the current revision.
